630910 old <s>va/su—deva</s> ¦ <lex>m.</lex> <ab>N.</ab> of the father of <s1 slp1="kfzRa">Kṛṣṇa</s1> (he was the son of <s1 slp1="SUra">Śūra</s1>, a descendant of <s1 slp1="yadu">Yadu</s1> of the lunar line, and was also called <s1 slp1="Anaka-dunduBi">Ānaka-dundubhi</s1> <ab>q.v.</ab>, because at his birth the gods, foreseeing that <s1 slp1="vizRu">Viṣṇu</s1> would take a human form in his family, sounded the drums of heaven for joy; he was a brother of <s1 slp1="kuntI">Kuntī</s1> or <s1 slp1="pfTA">Pṛthā</s1>, the mother of the <s1 slp1="paRqu">Paṇḍu</s1> princes, who were thus cousins of <s1 slp1="kfzRa">Kṛṣṇa</s1>; See <hom>1.</hom> <s>kfzRa</s>), <ls>MBh.</ls>; <ls>Hariv.</ls>; <ls>BhP.</ls> &c.<info lex="m"/>
